label: Task-2
title: Run second-story exercise on git commit identity incident
description: AppSec/CISO runs the 'second story' exercise on the git commit identity incident. Trace the systemic conditions that allowed the issue, not just the surface-level cause. Source: Document 1 (Philosophy).
